mapper.select: select order_id, book_id, quantity, ISBN, title, author from `order` o left join book on o.book_id = book.book_id where order_id = #{orderId}
select order_id, book_id,quantity, ISBN, title, author from `order` o left join book on o.book_id = book.book_id where in_warehousing_id = #{inWarehousingId}
